svg.title: Test percentage stroke-width repaints after viewport size change
svg.script: function doTest() { document.getElementById("inner").setAttribute("width", "100"); document.getElementById("inner").setAttribute("height", "100"); document.documentElement.removeAttribute('class'); } document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); setTimeout(doTest, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest
